message: I propose we divide the money in an 80/20 split. I believe this is fair considering the diminishing value of money with each round.
I think 60/40 is a fair compromise, considering the value of money decreases more for you than me.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 72/28 split. This maintains a balance while accounting for the diminishing value of money for both of us.
I'm willing to compromise and meet in the middle with a 50/50 split, considering the value of money is decreasing for both of us.
